law.catch_line: Except as provided in § 13-207(a)(9), (10), (15), and (16) of this subtitle, the transfer tax appli...
law.text: Except as provided in § 13-207(a)(9), (10), (15), and (16) of this subtitle, the transfer tax applies to conveyances that transfer the real property of a corporation to its stockholders, the real property of a limited liability company to its members, or the real property of a partnership to its partners.
